thread.title: Teresa Mbemba Performs for NJCAA College in the United States
thread.title_full: Teresa Mbemba Performs for NJCAA College in the United States

author: archyworldyscom
title: Teresa Mbemba Performs for NJCAA College in the United States
text:
News from Angola – Angolan basketball player Teresa Mbemba will represent Frank Phillips College of the NJCAA in the state of Texas (USA) this season.
The 19-year-old played for Inter de Benguela and later in Portugal at the MVP Academy in Rio Maior.
In a conversation with Notícias de Angola, the basketball player said that after representing Angola in the African Under-16 and Under-18 Championships, she was invited to play at the MVP Academy in Portugal.
“After representing Angola in the African Under-16 and Under-18 Championships, the Portuguese Academy became interested and after receiving the invitation I agreed to go,” he revealed.
According to the athlete, after playing for seven months for the Academy, her performances attracted the attention of universities in the United States and they offered her scholarships to play and study in the United States.
Teresa Mbemba explained that she intends to continue working to grow her career as a professional basketball player and represent the Angolan national team at senior level.
